title: 5th Annual Pet Donation Drive + Adoptions (Union City)
description:
Submitted by the Event OrganizerVibes and Smiles Inc. We’re back for our 5th Annual #ProjectBestFriend Donation Drive! 
Hosted by Vibes & Smiles, this free community event brings together local vendors, music, and family fun, all while supporting pets in need.
What to Expect:
    
    
    
      
    
    


Adoptions with Hayward Animal Shelter – meet dogs & cats looking for their forever homes
Live music + local DJ bringing the vibes
Shop unique finds from local small businesses & creators
Give back by donating items from our Pet Essentials Wishlist
A community day full of smiles, giving, and connection

Wishlist Donations Needed:

Canned dog & cat food (any brand)
Anti-cling dryer sheets
Peanut butter
Treats
Toys
Scoopable & clumping litter
Fresh carrots (with leafy tops), basil, rosemary, parsley, cilantro, alfalfa sprouts
KMR & Esbilac brand kitten & puppy formula (new only)

Let’s come together to uplift lives: two-legged and four-legged!
Disclaimer: Please double check event information with the event organizer as events can be canceled, details can change after they are added to our calendar, and errors do occur.
